entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:16 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 1:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
